nodes.text: Ebela Puckett was a female Human who lived on Corellia during the Galactic Civil War. She was the leader of the Grey Shroud terrorists.

After the Battle of Yavin, Ebela Puckett and the Grey Shroud terrorists were based in the Thaos Mountains, near the city of Doaba Guerfel. Circa 1 ABY, CorSec agents led by Captain Vitala Baize assaulted the base and killed Ebela Puckett. The assault was part of a larger operation which aim was to infiltrate an agent among the criminal organization known as the Chirq Council. The true objective of the assault against the Grey Shroud was to demonstrate the loyalty of the agent to the Chirq Council. The CorSec agent pretended that Ebela Puckett was an informant tasked by the CorSec to spy the Council. With the support of manufactured evidences, the agent managed to convince the Chirq Council underboss Jzoro Quanera that this story was real and successfully infiltrated the organization.

Ebela Puckett appeared as a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Ebela Puckett was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006.
